name: CyberQCloud
0:
”Alexa, launch cyber q cloud”
”What is my food 1 temperature”
”Set food 1 target temperature to 250”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cyber q. cloud
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The CyberQ Cloud skill is designed to allow owners of the CyberQ Cloud device, made by BBQ Guru, to monitor and control their temperature control device by using Alexa voice commands. You can check your current temperatures, set new target temperatures, set your timer, and even give names to your different food probes. This gives you the freedom to check on your BBQ simply with the sound of your voice.

Your CyberQ Cloud must previously be registered on ShareMyCook.com before linking this skill.
